entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
